name: LSMResult
desc: A result of a lookup in a map.

items.name: func LSMResultCreate(CFAllocator?, LSMMap, LSMText, CFIndex, CFOptionFlags) -> Unmanaged<LSMResult>
items.desc: Returns the categories or words that best match when a text is mapped into a map, in decreasing order of likelihood.

items.name: func LSMResultGetCategory(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> LSMCategory
items.desc: Returns the category of the specified result.

items.name: func LSMResultGetScore(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> Float
items.desc: Returns the likelihood of the specified result.

items.name: func LSMResultCopyToken(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> Unmanaged<CFData>?
items.desc: Returns the token for the n-th best (zero-based) result.

items.name: func LSMResultCopyTokenCluster(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> Unmanaged<CFArray>?
items.desc: Returns the cluster of tokens for the n-th best (zero-based) result.

items.name: func LSMResultCopyWord(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?
items.desc: Returns the word for the n-th best (zero-based) result.

items.name: func LSMResultCopyWordCluster(LSMResult, CFIndex) -> Unmanaged<CFArray>?
items.desc: Returns the cluster of words for the n-th best (zero-based) result.

items.name: func LSMResultGetTypeID() -> CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for Latent Semantic Mapping results.
